text: Pro Tip: Use `/start <width> <height> <mines>` to start a vanilla Minesweeper game!
Pro Tip: Use `/forfeit` to end the current game!
Board bugged out? Use '/kill' to remove it from the channel.
Want to see who made me? Try `/credits`!
Want to use the bot in your own server? Try `/invite`.
Having a mine density of over 30% will cause you problems.
Try our hand-made missions by typing `/missions`.
Pro Tip: Zero mines are basically invisible unless you know how to find them!
